{{cpp/iterator/istreambuf_iterator/title|operator*}}
{{cpp/iterator/istreambuf_iterator/navbar}}
{{ddcl|
CharT operator*() const;
}}

Reads a single character by calling {{c|sbuf_-&gt;sgetc()}} where {{c|sbuf_}} is the stored pointer to the stream buffer.

The behavior is undefined if the iterator is end-of-stream iterator.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The value of the obtained character.
